pkgmetadata.longdescription: Retinal Reconstruction Program // Reconstructs retinae by morphing a flat surface with cuts (a dissected flat-mount retina) onto a curvilinear surface (the a standard retinal shape). It can estimate the position of a point on the intact adult retina to within 8 degrees of arc (3.6% of nasotemporal axis). The coordinates in reconstructed retinae can be transformed to visuotopic coordinates.
